title: Green and recyclable catalyst based on chitosan/CuFe2O4 nanocomposite hydrogel for one-step synthesis of 1,2,3-triazoles
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,31320-31331
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05626D, Paper
Open Access

Fatemeh Ajormal, Rahman Bikas, Hossein Ghasemzadeh, Nader Noshiranzadeh, Anna Kozakiewicz-Piekarz
Synthesis and characterization of a new recyclable CS/CuFe2O4 nanocomposite hydrogel and its catalytic activity in the green synthesis of 1,2,3-triazoles have been reported.
